# Series 3

## Exercise 3.13

::: {#d2abf6e1 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
```
:::


### a.

::: {#c95792e7 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
M = np.array([[1, 7], [4, 2]])
M
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
```
array([[1, 7],
       [4, 2]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#310aaf42 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
N = np.diag([6, 5])
N
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
```
array([[6, 0],
       [0, 5]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#a6327428 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
P = np.full(shape=[2, 2], fill_value=-np.pi)
P
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4}
```
array([[-3.14159265, -3.14159265],
       [-3.14159265, -3.14159265]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#bd6f5ce6 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
Q = np.e * np.eye(1) + np.sqrt(2) * np.eye(2)
Q
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5}
```
array([[4.13249539, 2.71828183],
       [2.71828183, 4.13249539]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#b7d3887f .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
R = np.block([[M, N], [P, Q]])
R
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6}
```
array([[ 1.        ,  7.        ,  6.        ,  0.        ],
       [ 4.        ,  2.        ,  0.        ,  5.        ],
       [-3.14159265, -3.14159265,  4.13249539,  2.71828183],
       [-3.14159265, -3.14159265,  2.71828183,  4.13249539]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#0bea98e6 .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
Null = np.zeros([2,2])
Null

S = np.block([[M+N, Null], [Null, P/np.pi]])
S
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
```
array([[ 7.,  7.,  0.,  0.],
       [ 4.,  7.,  0.,  0.],
       [ 0.,  0., -1., -1.],
       [ 0.,  0., -1., -1.]])
```
:::
:::


### b.

::: {#97106537 .cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
np.shape(R)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8}
```
(4, 4)
```
:::
:::


### c.

::: {#d5abe5d3 .cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
RS = R + S
RS
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9}
```
array([[ 8.        , 14.        ,  6.        ,  0.        ],
       [ 8.        ,  9.        ,  0.        ,  5.        ],
       [-3.14159265, -3.14159265,  3.13249539,  1.71828183],
       [-3.14159265, -3.14159265,  1.71828183,  3.13249539]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#7ec0fa40 .cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
R_t = np.transpose(R)
R_t
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=10}
```
array([[ 1.        ,  4.        , -3.14159265, -3.14159265],
       [ 7.        ,  2.        , -3.14159265, -3.14159265],
       [ 6.        ,  0.        ,  4.13249539,  2.71828183],
       [ 0.        ,  5.        ,  2.71828183,  4.13249539]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#11b506ed .cell execution_count=11}
``` {.python .cell-code}
MN = M @ N
MN
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=11}
```
array([[ 6, 35],
       [24, 10]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#65c7348f .cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
NM = N @ M
NM
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=12}
```
array([[ 6, 42],
       [20, 10]])
```
:::
:::


### d.

``` {.python .cell-code}
MM
```


:::


::: {#e378a32e .cell execution_count=14}

``` {.python .cell-code}
NN
```

```
       [    1,  3125]])
```
:::
:::

``` {.python .cell-code}
R_13
```

### f.

::: {#deaabca6 .cell execution_count=17}
``` {.python .cell-code}
R[:, [1, 3]] = R[:, [3, 1]]
R
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=17}
```
array([[ 1.        ,  0.        ,  6.        ,  7.        ],
       [ 4.        ,  5.        ,  0.        ,  2.        ],
       [-3.14159265,  2.71828183,  4.13249539, -3.14159265],
       [-3.14159265,  4.13249539,  2.71828183, -3.14159265]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#d11e2dba .cell execution_count=18}
``` {.python .cell-code}
R[:, 0] = 2 * R[:, 0]
R
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=18}
```
array([[ 2.        ,  0.        ,  6.        ,  7.        ],
       [ 8.        ,  5.        ,  0.        ,  2.        ],
       [-6.28318531,  2.71828183,  4.13249539, -3.14159265],
       [-6.28318531,  4.13249539,  2.71828183, -3.14159265]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#682181ef .cell execution_count=19}
``` {.python .cell-code}
R[2, :] = R[0, :] + R[1, :]
R
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=19}
```
array([[ 2.        ,  0.        ,  6.        ,  7.        ],
       [ 8.        ,  5.        ,  0.        ,  2.        ],
       [10.        ,  5.        ,  6.        ,  9.        ],
       [-6.28318531,  4.13249539,  2.71828183, -3.14159265]])
```
:::
:::


# Series 5

## Exercise 5.2

### a

::: {#b97d8c7b .cell execution_count=20}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np

A = np.array(
    [
        [24, 68, 0, -36],
        [0, 34, 82, -79],
        [5, 76, -33, 0],
        [-2, 0, -63, 65]
    ]
)

b = np.array(
    [
        [16],
        [-2],
        [58],
        [69]
    ]
)

res = np.linalg.solve(A, b)
print(res)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[[1.]
 [2.]
 [3.]
 [4.]]
```
:::
:::
